Reviews.Title: Best NVR for the buck! Cry once and buy the best.
Reviews.Author: Wanderer

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel NVR with 1080p high definition live viewing & playback in 30fps real time
4 Indoor/outdoor cameras with 1080p lines of resolution and 115' night vision
2TB hard drive
PC & Mac Remote Viewing Capability
iPhone, iPad, Android, and Blackberry Viewing via Free App
ProductInfo.Name: Swann 8 Channel HD NVR Security System with 2TB Hard Drive and 4 1080p IP Cameras
